thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 87 of 1961
thread.title: Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text:
My son used tyresonthe drive last year and said they were very good, so thought I should give them a try. Excellent service the engineers were polite and considerate. When I said I had a problem with my other tyre they helped and showed me what the problem was and put it right for me
with a charge. The reason i chose tyresonthedrive was value for money with no hidden cost for wheel balance/fvalves or diposal of tyres
and the service was faultless.. I will use them again when the time comes
